body.name: Bestier L Shaped Desk with Shelves, 75 Inch Reversible Corner Computer Desk or 2 Person Long Table, Writing Study Desk for Home Office Bedroom Apartment, Wash White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 25 mins
features: 🔸3 Different Configurations: Chosen it to be a 47" corner desk or a 75" long desk, it's up to you. The l option makes full use of corner space and the long option is very suitable for 2 teens student studying together.

🔸Function Meets Style: Can easily fit 2 monitors on one side and still have room for a printer and assorted things on the other side. Equipped with 2 cable holes, the l desk with shelf functions well organized in home and office.
🔸Flexible Storage Shelves: The shelves under desk can be installed at Right + Middle or Left + Middle when becoming an l-shaped desk; also can be Right + Middle when a long straight desk.
🔸Sturdy Build: Crafted of stainless steel frame and P2 grade particleboard certified by CARB, the office computer desk works very stable for long time use.
🔸Straightforward Manual: Everything is packed with styrofoam and thick cardboard. Easy assembly with labeled parts and illustrated instructions for a simple and stress-free build.
body.description: Bestier 75.5" Minimalist L Shaped Desk with Shelf Installation Note: Prepare a vacant area for the package and assembly, and better take gloves to protect your hands in the whole process.Please read the manual in the package and the assembly video on the product page carefully for quick installation.We suggest you better use an electric drill but use the screwdriver directly in the package if the electric drill doesn't work.Please note the direction of each part in every step, then you will align the holes every time. L Shaped: 47.2"L x 47.2"W x 29.1"H Long Shaped: 75.5"L x 18.9"W x 29.1"H Material: CARB P2 Particle Board, Stainless Steel Frame

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Upgrade Your Home Office or Gaming Setup
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bestier L Shaped Gaming Desk with Shelves, and I'm absolutely loving it! Here are some of my thoughts on this desk:Pros:The desk is incredibly spacious, giving me plenty of room to work and play games without feeling cramped.The L-shaped design is great for multitasking, as I can easily switch between my computer and paperwork without having to get up and move around.The shelves on the side of the desk are a fantastic addition, providing extra storage space for all of my gaming accessories and other items.The desk is sturdy and well-made, with a solid construction that feels like it will last for years.Cons:Assembly can be a bit tricky, especially if you're not used to putting together furniture. However, the instructions are clear and easy to follow, so it's not too difficult.There are no drawers with this desk setup, so you might want to look into purchasing some drawers as well. I ended up getting two sets of 6 drawers on casters from Ikea to work with this desk setup. I also purchased two of these. One I made into a full straight desk, and the other one I made into an L shape.I highly recommend the Bestier L Shaped Gaming Desk with Shelves. It's a fantastic desk for gamers and anyone who needs plenty of workspace, and the added shelves are a great bonus. The desk is well-made and sturdy, and I expect it will last me for years to come.Ohh! And the carbon fiber looks amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy put together and sturdiness’s
reviews.reviewText: Desk was super easy to put together looks great anyway. Super easy to keep clean and is very sturdy and hold a gaming PC just fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great desk for kids
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a great value for the price. It assembles easily although the instructions are a little confusing because you can configure the desk and shelves a couple of ways. You’ll have a few pieces left over depending on what you choose. It’s light weight so easy to move but sturdy enough to hold books and school supplies. The additional space gives room for a laptop and monitor and we still have room to spread out papers and books for reading and studying. I like the light color and contrasts that make it look like a nicer desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small space
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm pleasantly surprised how durable and nice this desk is. It fits perfectly in the space I designated it for. Great for small spaces. If was easy to put together and took about 40 minutes. An overall great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this desk!
reviews.reviewText: I don't give many 5 star reviews and to be honest, I really wasn't expecting much from this desk. It was packaged ok and I did notice what looks like some weird imperfections that looked like white streaks or rub marks on on of the desk tops but it kind of just blended in to the color.Set up was super easy. Some reviewers are talking about a 4 hour assembly time?!? Maybe I was fortunate and got a good one but this desk was completed in maybe 30 minutes. Maybe some reviewers were cranking on the screws too hard but this was super easy and self explanatory. On thing I will say that at least one reviewer is wrong about is that you CAN NOT have the straight version AND have the shelves on the left hand side. Not unless you redo the desktop holes and strengthen the new merging piece locations. I modified mine and utilized the bar and some L metal clips screwed into the legs to have one long shelf on the left side. I am using a triple monitor set up with my main 32" and it is plenty sturdy. My only issue with my set up is that my right hand speaker is stuck behind the right monitor but that is not the fault of the desk. It looks amazing, it's sturdy and it's one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Desk Highly Recommended!
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit worried about getting this desk since there were a few bad reviews that involved damaged parts and poor construction on materials. However, I want to share my experience with receiving and assembling the desk. The box arrived and the box was a little banged up but of course with cardboard and the whole thing weighing 70+ lbs that is to be expected. The pieces were packed in nicely and had protective pieces and foam on corners and between sections to assure that nothing would be damaged. Every piece was labeled and marked. The screws and small pieces were also all individually bagged and marked with a letter to help identify which part you needed to use. They also included a spare parts bag but I did not need to use these. The instructions were clear and as long as you follow the instructions and use the correct pieces where it says than you should be good, you have to make sure you see how the part is oriented and as long as you do that you should have no problem. It was nice they included a screwdriver, but it was so short that grabbed my own since it was difficult to get enough torque to tighten some screws with the small driver. I really recommend this desk. It is super sturdy and I like the depth and height. When I was searching for desks online, some had depths of around 18 inches, and I was trying to find one a bit longer and this one at 22 inches is nice and leaves a good amount of space.Also it arrived very quickly. When I ordered it it said it would take about 2 weeks but I got it 5 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me start with, I love this desk! HOWEVER, the desk comes with the WORST directions for construction ever. There are no words, just drawings. You absolutely have to look at which way which board goes or which side which rail goes on. It took my brother-in-law and I two and a half hours to put this sucker together. One rail facing the wrong direction will have you doing more taking apart than putting together. But once you get it…the desk is amazing and ver spacious. Wish I had ordered a lighter colored one, but too late now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was perfect for our daughter's room. She sets up half the desk for school work/computer and other side she uses as a vanity. Easy to assemble and super sturdy. Definitely recommend!!
This computer dest was easy to set up and very durable. The grey oak is beautiful. Lots of room to place 3 screens and a printer.
Super produit.Notice claire et facile. Pièce identifié donc simpleProduit de bonne qualitéJe recommande

1 Entrega muy rápida2 Buenas instrucciones y fácil montaje3 Bonito4 Muy resistente, con buenas resistencias y refuerzos5 Versátil; se puede montar de 3 maneras distintas lo cual hace que se adapte a casi cualquier espacio.El color me gusta mucho más en persona; lo volvería a comprar sin lugar a duda.

Für den Preis absolut unschlagbar. Größe für mich in einer 30 m² Wohnung optimal.Alleine der Fakt, dass man den Tisch seinen Bedürfnissen entsprechend auf 3 unterschiedliche Weisen aufbauen kann ist super. Ich habe mich für eine der Eckvarianten entschieden.Anleitung fand ich zeitweise verwirrend, zugegebenermaßen war es an dem Tag des Aufbaus aber sehr heiß und ich hatte gerade am Tag davor einen Umzug gestemmt.Aufbau an sich war problemlos. Es waren sogar 1-2 Ersatzschrauben dabei.Sieht toll aus und hochwertig.

This desk really impressed me! I've bought lots of similar furniture in the past with 'meh' experiences. This desk went together extremely easy, and once together it not only looks great, but it's very sturdy.Highly recommended, would definitely buy again.
